response.overview: The story of Air Force Squadron 201 as never before told. The fighter pilots of "The One" open their hearts and speak for the first time in 50 years and after the Yom Kippur War about the crisis of command in the squadron, the conflicts and fractures that refuse to heal even after half a century, pilots who pretended to be sick, the torture they went through in captivity and one traumatic sortie, which is still controversial to this day.
response.title: The One
